message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that you're interested in. I'm asking for $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a little to $9,500.  This feels like a fair price for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,200. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
